An ancient thurible of blackened brass, its surface etched with worn holy symbols and rusted chain links. When lit, it releases a pale, curling incense that whispers in forgotten tongues, carrying sorrowful wails and fleeting glimpses of the dead.

"Their grief will calm the spirits—if you can bear to carry it."

Effect:
When lit, the censer pacifies hostile spirits within a short radius for one scene. However, the one who bears it suffers hallucinations of Evershade’s final moments. When used, make a Risk roll. One a 1, take a Ruin if used more than once without rest.
